subject: Password Reset Confirmation for your Banking Portal
body: You have successfully initiated a password reset for your banking portal account. Your new password has been set. For your security, we recommend that you create a strong, unique password and avoid using it on any other websites. If you did not initiate this password change, or if you believe your account may have been compromised, please contact our dedicated support team immediately at the phone number provided in this email. Our team is available 24/7 to assist you with any security concerns you may have. Your account security is our top priority, and we take every measure to protect your personal and financial information.
